open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Walmer
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Walmer, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Octotel Outage | Struisbaai
open.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Struisbaai. Affected clients will experience no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience.

updates.content: There is a suspected fibre break however due to safety concerns, a team may only be dispatched tomorrow to investigate. Octotel is investigating alternate solutions to restore services as soon as possible.
